basics.name: Jihan Yang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: A passionate data science student with experience in machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing, committed to solving real-world challenges through innovative AI solutions.

work.name: GreenView Floors International Inc.
work.summary: Applied machine learning and data science techniques to optimize user engagement strategies and drive business insights.
highlights: Developed machine learning models to analyze customer interaction data.
Built predictive models using Python and TensorFlow to identify purchasing behaviors.
Automated data cleaning and analysis processes to reduce manual effort.

work.name: University of Science and Technology of China
work.summary: Conducted research in natural language processing to develop a dialect translation system.
highlights: Designed and implemented a TensorFlow-based neural network for dialect translation.
Collected and standardized dialect-to-Mandarin comparison datasets.
Optimized model accuracy through iterative hyperparameter tuning.

work.name: Neusoft Corporation
work.summary: Automated testing for a car reservation system using Python, ensuring system reliability and robustness.
highlights: Developed Python scripts to automate regression testing for critical modules.
Simulated user interactions and negative test cases using regular expressions.
Analyzed system logs to detect and resolve errors, improving overall reliability.

courses: INFO 103: Social Media, Ethics, and Automation
INFO 380: Product and Information System Management
